channel.title: Weirdest thing you've done while high?
channel.description:
The weirdest thing I've done was:
I tried to smoke scrambled eggs. I tried to smoke cereal. I tried to smoke bacon grease. I tried to smoke brocoli. Also I tend to act like I'm a king and I order my friends around and talk proper. I'll be like "Thou shall get my bucket, nigger."
What about you guys?

item.title: Weirdest thing you've done while high?
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:10, topic:301855”]This isn’t appropriate for a forum where the average age is so young, don’t post about it again.

Thanks.[/quote]

Read full topic
item.source: Weirdest thing you've done while high?

item.title: Weirdest thing you've done while high?
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[quote="`Alec, post:1, topic:303955"][quote author=Primadude link=topic=400077.msg2967958#msg2967958 date=1253740490]

Sorry I’m normal so i don’t know what all that stuff feels like.

This. I have never nor do I ever plan getting high.
[/quote]
This.

Except now a bunch of people that do drugs will flame.[/quote]
LOLOLOLOLOL. `Alec. LOLOLOLOLOL. Dunno, when I see you post, I laugh. All posts in general; not this one.

The Reaper X:

Went to the gas station, bought donuts and a milk. I left the donuts, the milk, and my wallet on the counter and walked out.

How long did it take you to notice? o__O’

Read full topic
item.source: Weirdest thing you've done while high?

[quote="`Alec, post:1, topic:303955"][quote author=Primadude link=topic=400077.msg2967958#msg2967958 date=1253740490]

Sorry I’m normal so i don’t know what all that stuff feels like.

This. I have never nor do I ever plan getting high.
[/quote]
This.

Except now a bunch of people that do drugs will flame.[/quote]

(Insert long ass, hard, typed up message that wasted 30 minutes of this guys life that nobody gives a fucking fuck about here.)
[center] Your posts are completely useless lately. You speak about people not caring about your post. This part is true, so why do you proceed to post it? Seven day mute for you.[/center]

Read full topic

item.title: Weirdest thing you've done while high?
item.dc:creator: @the1337legend the1337legend
item.description:
@the1337legend wrote:

cheezies work too!, altho sometimes the it smells like burnt cheese rather than, cheese, so yh… cheezies > insert your geyazzshizher

uhm @ topic… tbh…
climbed up on a small shack and brawled with 3 ppl (fun with 3 friends, not random geyazz stangers that happen to be standing on a shack waiting for some guy to climbz a fence and jump on it and then go beat the poo<-(IKR!) outa them, then fall off) and fell off D: then slept, b.c i get tired at 2:10 exactly dunno why, its leik 2:09, partying, 1 minute later BAM on the ground… B A M

Read full topic
